pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Clove Oil 13ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Clove Oil for the temporary relief of toothache. 100% essential oil.

Thursday Plantation Clove Oil for the temporary relief of toothache. 100% essential oil.

Size: 13mL

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• temporary relief of toothaches
• Used in traditional aromatherapy as an analgesic for toothache
• 100% natural.

Directions

Add 1 to 2 drops onto a cotton bud; and apply directly onto painful tooth twice daily. Take care to avoid nearby mouth tissue.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap. Recycle glass bottle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
